name: @zkbridge/zk
description: ZK circuits and proof generation for ZKBridge

scripts.setup: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 pot12_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v && snarkjs groth16 setup bridge.r1cs pot12_final.ptau bridge_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute bridge_0000.zkey bridge_0001.zkey --name="1st Contributor Name" -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey bridge_0001.zkey verification_key.json
